CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 23, 1953, pg. 33, reads: "Scenes From Weil School Operetta - When the operetta, 'Sourwood Mountain,' directed by Mrs. Ernestine Parks and James Miller, was produced at A. Leo Weil School on Tuesday, May 19, these were two of the many scenes in production... In the right photo, George Buckner listens to LaVerne Terhost as Carolyn Hatton peeps out of the window. Robert Young also listens. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: LaVerne Terhost playing accordion, surrounded by boys and girls, including George Buckner, Carolyn Hatton, and Robert Young, in production of operetta "Sourwood Mountain" at A. Leo Weil School
